Uri.title: URI
Uri.description: URI for downloading a statement for a specific account associated with your institution.

ValidUntilDate.title: Valid Until Date
ValidUntilDate.description: Date and time the URI will remain valid until. Time in UTC.

Year.title: Year
Year.description: Year for which the statement has been generated in the Four Digit Year format (e.g., 2021).

Month.title: Month
Month.description: Month for which the statement has been generated in the 1 - 12 format (e.g., 1 for January and 12 for December).

Currency.title: Currency
Currency.description: Three-letter ISO currency code for the currency of the account for which the statement has been generated.

Format.title: Format
Format.description: File format in which the statement has been generated.

AccountIban.title: Account IBAN
AccountIban.description: International Bank Account Number for the account for which the statement has been generated.
